articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Umpire leaves Yankees-Guardians game after being struck in face by relay throw - The Guardian
articles.description: Umpire Larry Vanover is being evaluated for a concussion and other injuries at a hospital after being struck in the head with a relay throw
articles.content: Umpire Larry Vanover is being evaluated for a concussion and other injuries at a hospital after being struck in the head with a relay throw during Wednesdays game between the New York Yankees and Cle… [+1747 chars]
